description.en: NPAS is an innovative financial application that provides fast and safe P2P trading. Unlike other cryptocurrency wallets that only allow payments, NPAS allows real-time cash and e-money transactions and provides a safe trading system for all users. Users can buy and sell various currencies and cryptocurrencies with just one tap, and all user data is protected through an advanced security system.
